question: Is it all right for us (females) to make duaa after taleem?
answer:
QUESTION
Every night our family does taleem and after taleem one of us makes duaa out loud. (We are all females except for our father). Is it permissible for one of us (females) to make the duaa or does my father have to do it?
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

It is permissible for females to make loud Du'aa among themselves on
condition there are no Ghayr Mahram (not prohibited in marriage) males
present. The father is a Mahram.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
